nodes.bodyText: This means that the order of the scripts is undefined - is this expected? I would likely expect (a) order as it is in the file or maybe better (b) alphabetical sort.
Actually, not sure what Map implementation is used by the JSON parser so it could be linked hashMap. Could you pleae verify it? Thank you.
Aha, now I see that the sorting is in the action itself.

Added @NullAllowed annotation.
I didn't find @Nullable annotation in NetBeans.

Should check whether phpModule is null.
composerJson  is never null.
Should use another variable name instead of scripts because this class has the same field name.
